title: S'PORE MUMMIES PETITION FOR COMPULSORY CCTV IN ALL CHILDCARE CENTRES TO PROTECT YOUNG ONES
text:
S'PORE MUMMIES PETITION FOR COMPULSORY CCTV IN ALL CHILDCARE CENTRES TO PROTECT YOUNG ONES   
<Credits: Karen Tey> Advertisement 
Dear Parents, kindly join our hands into relating to the relevant authorities that CCTV SHOULD and MUST be installed in every childcare centres in Singapore. They should make it a compulsory thing. 
Add in that relevant authorities should make and do more unannounced spot checks on cc centres be it to check their teachers' standard or hygiene standard. 
Approval of cc licenses should also b stricter n not just "u can afford to pay we will give it to u" kind of system. For the sake of our young ones, kindly fill in the ECDA feedback forms and submit. 
May the forces be with us
